name: MadameRuby
0:
”Alexa ask Madame Ruby to flip a coin”
”Alexa ask Madame Ruby to pick a number between one and ten”
”Alexa ask Madame Ruby to play rock paper scissors”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: madame ruby
des: Having a hard time making a decision? Assign your options to each side of a coin and ask Madame Ruby to flip a coin. Can't decide which child should get the last cookie? Ask each of them show you a number between one and ten on their hands and then ask the Madame Ruby to pick a number and whoever is closer wins! Don't know if you deserve a day off from work. Play a round of Rock Paper Scissors against Madame Ruby to see if you win.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
